name: Onsharp
overview:
Onsharp is an interactive agency that architects, builds, and supports web-based solutions. We’re passionate about technology, but not just because we think it’s cool. We are experts at helping businesses understand how new technologies and trends can help them meet customer demand while improving productivity.

We offer services in strategy, development, and online marketing.

STRATEGY We’ll quickly get up-to-speed on your business, customers, and opportunities and build a solid plan to meet your goals along with the tools and metrics you’ll need to continually “track and tweak.”

DEVELOPMENT We’ll design and build the websites, web-based services and mobile apps required to bring your vision to life. We’ll deliver tools, such as content management, that give you the power and freedom to update your site based on your timeline, not ours.

ONLINE MARKETING We’ll help you take your marketing to the next level with search engine optimization, marketing metrics, social media, and interactive branding. And, we’ll work with you to streamline processes and leverage tasks so online tactics aren’t burdensome add-ons to already full plates. Onsharp offers a full array of services to help you leverage online trends and cutting edge web technology to drive great business results.
